message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe this price reflects the value it provides, while still allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $95 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm happy to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. While we aim to accommodate our customers' needs, we need to ensure a reasonable profit margin as well. I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product. This price reflects the value provided and allows us to maintain a fair business practice. Please let me know if this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $90 is closer, I'm still not quite there.  I'm happy to pay $87.50 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. I propose offering the product at $89. This price allows us to maintain a fair profit while still being competitive. I hope this suggestion is acceptable to you.
